Headline: #76 Diversey Temporary Reroute at Diversey/Narragansett
ShortDescription: 76 Diversey buses are temporarily rerouted via Diversey, Narragansett, Belmont, Oak Park and Diversey, due to street blockage near Diversey/Narragansett.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#76 Diversey buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Diversey, Narragansett, Belmont, Oak Park, then resume their normal route on Diversey, due to street blockage near Diversey/Narragansett.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #62 Archer Temporary Reroute near Kinzie/Dearborn
ShortDescription: 62 Archer buses temp. rerouted SB Dearborn, Hubbard, Clark, Wacker and Dearborn; NB State, Wacker, Clark, Hubbard and Dearborn: near Kinzie/Dearborn..

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#62 Archer buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Kinzie/Dearborn, due to street blockage near Kinzie/Dearborn.

Southbound buses will operate via Dearborn, Hubbard, Clark, Wacker and Dearborn including the normal route streets.

Northbound buses will operate via State, Wacker, Clark, Hubbard and Dearborn.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #29 State , #36 Broadway Temporary Reroute at Kinzie/Dearborn
ShortDescription: 29 State , 36 Broadway  buses are temporarily rerouted via State, Hubbard, Clark, Wacker and State: due to, street blockage near Kinzie/Dearborn.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#29 State , #36 Broadway  buses are temporarily rerouted via State, Hubbard, Clark, Wacker and State: due to, street blockage near Kinzie/Dearborn.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #50 Damen Temporary Northbound  Reroute near Damen/18th
ShortDescription: Northbound 50 Damen buses are temp rerouted via Damen, 18th, Ashland, Roosevelt, then resume their normal route on Damen, due to street blockage near Damen/18th

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, 18th, Ashland, Roosevelt, then resume their normal route on Damen, due to street blockage near Damen/18th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Western
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing with major delays at Western due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing with major delays at Western due to police activity.

Shuttle buses are available from Forest Park to UIC to provide connecting service through the affected area.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
